feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 5 stages: D, R, I, V, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a working financial tool focused on stocks (multiple examples referenced) and shows implemented functionality that fetches and displays company-specific financial/contextual information. Discover and Implement stages confirm purpose and operational behavior, and Reflect shows user-perceived financial value, meeting the PASS standard.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Integrate AI: The submission shows clear, correct AI-like functionality conceptually (fetching content and producing plain-English company explanations and bull/bear analyses) and demonstrates value, but the student never explicitly describes AI integration or technical details. That indicates a correct but basic treatment of AI integration, so PARTIAL.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "this is an app to help you understand stocks, not just the charts."
"I chose to do something that would benefit me that I could use well beyond the class"
"and it'll load, fetching its content and then boom, right here."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — student selected a real financial need ("benefit me... beyond the class"); Implement — shows the app fetches content and loads tickers (demonstrates functioning feature); Reflect — student notes the app is helpful and reduces intimidation with charts, evidencing intended financial utility.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a working financial tool focused on stocks (multiple examples referenced) and shows implemented functionality that fetches and displays company-specific financial/contextual information. Discover and Implement stages confirm purpose and operational behavior, and Reflect shows user-perceived financial value, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "so this is an app to help you understand stocks, not just the charts."
"I chose to do something that would benefit me that I could use well beyond the class"
"and it'll load, fetching its content and then boom, right here."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER: student selected a practical problem (understanding stocks) and framed the app as adding explanatory value. IMPLEMENT: describes the app fetching content and producing explanatory outputs. REFLECT: student reports the tool is helpful and usable beyond class.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows clear, correct AI-like functionality conceptually (fetching content and producing plain-English company explanations and bull/bear analyses) and demonstrates value, but the student never explicitly describes AI integration or technical details. That indicates a correct but basic treatment of AI integration, so PARTIAL.
